content.description:
"Oy Vey Cuomo Choss" 5.2

LOOSE ROCK, AVOID

There are 3 blocks that should give way to nature's icey crow-bar soon. Until these blocks fall, avoid this mess as they are just barely balanced there... I was able to stand on them (perhaps hoping they would give way) but chose not to trundle them.
Sturdy trees are a good haul from the edge, chose not to disturb the mosses and lichen above.
content.protection: I use long static lines to anchor to trees a ways away from the edge
content.location: Avoid the loose blocks on Oy Vey Cuomo Choss, stay right, shooting for the highest part of the wall as the top.

content.description: Avoid. This started as a covid panic solution but is not wise or pleasant. Road-cut bouldering opportunity (avoid completely if the road is open during the tourist season). Â Doesn't always make for safe or quality climbing...I would also note that this area is closed during the day even for walking most of the tourist season (until mid November 2020). Use common sense.
